website_summaries.verdict: The sleek design of this will match your decor, though the brushed stainless steel can get dinged very easily.
pros: The size of this can fits nearly anywhere, and the lid seals well, keeping bugs and pets out
Scoop conveniently snaps into the bottom of the lid
cons: The biggest drawback is the high price

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is a lie
customer_reviews.text: The warranty is a lie. We purchased the Large Pet Food Storage Can on 10/11/15, to use as a dogproof garbage can. Worked great. Looked great. Last week (12/15/15), the plastic latch broke off when the dogs knocked the can over. Amazon wouldn't accept return since it was >30 days. No problem, since Simplehuman advertises 10 YEAR WARRANTY. Emailed Simplehuman who responded, after many days, "your product is out of warranty" The cust svc rep offered 20% off a new product if we provided a picture of what broke. However, we will not be so stupid as to purchase any product from Simplehuman ever again.
customer_reviews.author: John K Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, locks kibble in tight. But pretty disappointed in this item, considering simplehuman's reputation for quality. The wheels don't turn at all when on smooth flooring! I even turned it over to see if there was some kind of locking mechanism, but nope... Just stubborn wheels that only turn on carpeted/resistant surfaces. Kind of defeats the purpose, since I got this to protect our hardwood floor from scratches. When I spend $100+ on a kibble container, I expect it to work well.
customer_reviews.author: SushiBaby

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food storage
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an attractive and mouse proof way to store dog kibble. We found it! The wheels make it easy to move when necessary. The scoop provided is sturdy and very handy. I’m so glad we bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Buffie M. Elder

customer_reviews.title: Large container does not hold 30lbs of dog food
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with buying 30lbs bags of food at a time. Well I just got my first 30lbs bag and I tried dumping it all in this large container and I filled the container to the top and there's still a bunch of food left in the bag. What gives? A lot of people saying the large can handle even over 30lbs, not in my case. Either Royal canin sent me far more than 30lbs or simple human or Amazon sent me the wrong product. Not sure, but the container I received does not hold the 30lbs Royal canin food.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for a Simple Human product
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of stainless steel pet food storage cans, rather than the plastic ones you find in the pet stores. However, the sides of this unit are very thin and easily dented. Also, the handle is plastic, not steel, even though it's the color of steel. The handle is the most used part of the unit and the fake steel color easily scratches. The good points are the built-in scoop that's attached magnetically to the inside of the lid, and the rollers that make it easy pulling the unit in and out of my storage closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in PSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised was suppose to hold 40 pounds of food didnt even hold 32 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: robdon

customer_reviews.title: Order a dented one, and save time.
customer_reviews.text: First off I don't think you could invent a goofier latch however hard you try. Needs to be shorter and wider, it's so tall you need a five foot long arm to reach the bottom. They can't even design a box with packing good enough to be delivered without damage. With the amount of dented ones they have for sale I should have known better than to even try. Amazon should discontinue selling and save the environment from all the fuel spent hauling these bent up cans around the country. Returned for Amazon refund.
customer_reviews.author: Van of the Valley

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog food container
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews said they couldn't cram their dog food bags into the container...that's probably because you're not supposed to, it's a dog food container, pour your dog food into it. LOL This is not meant to house bag of food, it's meant for you to cut open the bag and dump it in. I love the way it matches my Simple Human garbage can in the kitchen, the fact the scoop clicks into the lid is awesome and I like how airtight it is for food freshness. While yes it is "soft" so you have to be more gentle with it, it's made no different than their garbage cans and they are "soft" as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett J

customer_reviews.title: and it seems like this is really one of only a few products ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research into air-tight pet food storage prior to my purchase, and it seems like this is really one of only a few products on the market with these features. The bin holds a bit more than advertised which is great. Build quality is excellent. The plastic scoop that attaches to the inside of the lid is awesome. My only complaint is that the bottom is plastic - not a big deal for most, but if you're fighting a rodent problem then a plastic bottom won't do you any good because they'll just chew right through.
customer_reviews.author: Brod

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I have been storing our very expensive prescription dog food in a bin to try to keep it fresh. Ugly, right? I happened to see this with of it's cool features and good reviews and thought why not. It is perfect. It holds the contents of the large bag of dry food. It makes it easy to scoop out with the handy scoop in the lid. And it is attractive and space saving. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as well as practical storage
customer_reviews.text: I love the brushed stainless look of the storage can in the kitchen. And, I especially love that it is keeping the food fresh, while keeping the smell of dog food contained. It has a nice feel to it when I open the lid and use the scoop which then clips back with a magnet to the underside of the lid. Very nice, high quality piece!
customer_reviews.author: michelle w

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Keep out Unwanted Critters!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product about two years ago, believing it would keep out unwanted critters. Unfortunately I just found that the can is infested with roaches below the plastic liner can. When I washed out the can I found that the water spilled out without my turning it over, so obviously the roaches got in that way. The bottom is plastic, which also attracts roaches, as the plastic feels warm (as opposed to stainless steel). Very disappointing and not the reason I paid $100 for a “sealed” pet food bin!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: High-class storage
customer_reviews.text: Rarely these days does a product exceed expectations when received, but the simplehuman container did exactly that. It is extremely high quality, well made, and beautifully designed. Dogs can't figure out the closure, either (at least not yet). Construction is superb both inside and out. I think the 32 lb. model might actually hold more than 32 lbs, since my dog food comes in 25 lb. bags and one bag fills it about halfway. The company behind the product seems to be a class act too, with terrific support and all literature nicely designed and informative. This has solved an age-old dog food storage problem for me. Worth every penny and more. My three Labs approve wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Klipspringer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful all at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs and ordered 3 of them. I wanted enough to hold plenty of dog food for the dogs, but also needed them to fit in the space I had. These fulfilled all my qualifications and then some. They are excellently built and gleam with the beautiful stainless steel which is so easy to clean. The beautiful locking system to open is easy to use and the handy scoop in the top keeps it right at hand. I love them all and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: otmichele

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the food storage solution I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Due to the pandemic, I've been buying different types of rice and dry pet food in bulk. After I found my cat in her kibble bag, I needed an air tight food storage container. After reviewing many options and their reviews, I purchased the simplehuman pet food storage container for my rice and cat food, mostly because of the positive review in which the customer used it for rice storage. I am extremely satisfied that I made this purchase of the 30 liter containers. I received my containers quickly and in pristine condition. I've been able to fit 25 lbs bags of rice and dry cat food directly into the containers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Large, sleek and perfect to hold RICE!
customer_reviews.text: After finding rice weevils in my rice recently, I had to look for something air tight, but also large enough to put in 30+ pounds of rice. After a long hard search, I found this!! Living in an Asian household, rice is essential and also runs out fast so we usually keeps 30+ pounds of rice at home. This is big enough to hold a large bag and also looks sleek in my home. I had to add a rice sticker on it so guests wouldn’t assume it was a garbage can, but all in all, I love this thing! Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: HighTension

customer_reviews.title: Came dented!
customer_reviews.text: Came dented. I didn’t believe the reviews but it’s true. You’ll most likely get a dented one, box was not damaged at all so this still made it past quality control.
customer_reviews.author: CokePokes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog Food container
customer_reviews.text: VERY Happy with this stainless steel XL dog food container. Arrived on time as promised, packaging perfect. Item arrived in excellent condition NO DENTS. I purchase 41 lb bags and this size container holds all but a 1 gallon zip lock bag...... can't complain at all. Highly recommend if you are looking for an airtight dog food container you will not be disappointed.... AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Claymaker

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I can recommend it for the money...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. It is airtight and the scoop is a nice touch, but the clamping mechanism is a little cumbersome (at some point, fingers are going to get pinched) and it's still Very Expensive for what it is. I love simplehuman products, and generally prefer them anytime over other poorly designed or poorly manufactured items, but I'm not convinced this particular item is worth your money (I bought/"needed" the biggest one). Sorry, simplehuman...
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DENT!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get much worse than this. My new expensive air tight container just arrived. Just reached out to see what the seller plans to do. I will update with their response.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with the storage can
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with the storage can. Love the wheels and the scoop in the lid. Five stars for the product. Our problem was that it came with four dents in it. There was no damage to the shipping box and no damage to the product box, so the dents must have happened at the factory. The box was too big and bulky to bother with a return, so we did our best to push them out. Wish there could have been an inspector or quality control person to catch this blemish.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Wheels dont turn
customer_reviews.text: This is used for dog food, but for what ever reason the wheels they put on this dont turn so well and the lid does not seal as well as an older version, I suspect a different Chinese factory is making these now vs a couple years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: The box was not damaged. But the item had a large dent. This is not “like new” condition.
customer_reviews.author: yellowrose3502

customer_reviews.title: It makes your kitchen look beautiful, haha
customer_reviews.text: Seriously just love the way this looks! My dog doesn’t eat that much so it keeps the food fresher longer ( I always buy the biggest bag) she also doesn’t try to get into her food bag but if you had a dog that did this can would work wonders! I had it in my save for later cart because it was so expensive but glad I finally purchased, it’s so beautiful haha
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight, won’t keep your pet food fresh
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very expensive trash can. The product is absolutely NOT airtight. Flimsy lock that obviously keeps a dog from opening it, but there is nothing tight about it - the latch simply goes over the lid, it does not pull it down or seal. Our entire closet where we keep ours smells like dog food - which means it is nowhere near airtight and your pet food is not staying fresh. Don’t waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Solution!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been looking for an effective and stylish container to store our Boston Terrier's food in. This sits nicely next to our simplehuman trashcan in the kitchen and holds a 25 pound bag of food with room to spare. The container is easy to wipe down and locks securely. The included magnetically attached scoop is also a nice plus. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I had searched for a container to store dog food in that would fit a 30lb bag, and I am so glad I found this one! Absolutely love that the 1 cup scoop magnetically sticks to the inside of the lid, it looks fantastic, and it locks in the freshness. This is easy to move as well as does have wheels. A very clean slick design makes it compatible to most decor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ford

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleaned, dog proof storage container
customer_reviews.text: This storage container has an easily operated locking mechanism and it is also quite easy to clean. It comes with a scoop that stores on the inside of the lid. However I use my own as I measure each serving of my dogs' food. The container keeps the kibble fresh and keeps out mice, ants etc. as the lid fits snugly and the locking mechanism cannot be opened by smart dogs or mice. I now have two of these containers.
customer_reviews.author: AD44HMC

customer_reviews.title: my dog has fresh kibble and my kitchen looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love that I get an airtight seal and that the stainless container fits in with my appliances. I am so happy not to have an ugly bag of dog food sitting around getting stale. I researched a long time to find something cheaper. And that is what I found...... cheap plastic containers. I paid a lot for this container, but I think I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra on this container! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend!! Very classy look that fits right in with stainless kitchen appliances. Easy open with scoop fitted and held by magnet just inside the lid. Hard to find a dog food container that holds as much as this. How many times have you emptied your feed into your container only to have some left in the bag? Now what? Where do I keep the extra food until it fits inside? Will it stay fresh? NO. Don’t waste your money on anything less. You will love it! I do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Hide your dog food from your dog and other humans...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice large pet food storage container. It is very stylish if that is something you need. I do not empty the food from the bag into this, but place the whole bag in here, and scoop from the bag. I like how the scoop fits into the underside of the lid, which makes it easy to use and not loose. The back wheels make it easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through several plastic storage bins that never hold up. I came across this one and while apprehensive about the price I decided give it a try. I have not not been disappointed. It keeps the food fresh with a good seal. It is very sturdy and actually an attractive bin to have sitting around. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doog

customer_reviews.title: MAKES A GREAT CONTAINER FOR BIRDSEED
customer_reviews.text: We are big birders here in the south. I bought 2 of these for my husband to store our bulk bags of birdseed in. They are better than we hoped for and recommend them to store seed, dog or cat food, etc. I also have other items made by Simplehuman and love them all: Dish drainer, 2 tall waste cans and a soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: queenofshells

customer_reviews.title: GREAT food storage bin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! I've been looking at it for a month or so but just couldn't bring myself to spend the money. I finally gave in!! And I'm so glad I did. I keep my dog food in my entry way to my house and I wanted something that looked nice. My main concern was being air tight to keep my dogs food fresh... no worries with this baby!!! Food is airtight, her 40 pound bag fit perfectly, the measuring cup is awesome, it's easy to maneuver... I am thrilled!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 40lb of dog food
customer_reviews.text: So love this container. The xl fits a 40lb bag of Victor food with a little extra room so I don't have to wait till I am completely out before cleaning and refilling. Love the scoop in the top held in with a magnet. I read the reviews about it being easy to ding or scratch. So I went ahead and bought a return to see for myself. Completely true! So happy I did. Not even a week and there is a scratch from putting a full dog dish on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Came extremely dented and in subpar condition. It works but looks like it went through hell and back to get to us. This should have been half off. Not $8 less. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Strodl

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of weevils, so I purchased this product to hold our pet food. So far it's working well. We shall see if I get any more weevils. The weevils seem to hatch in warm weather. I am praying that this does the trick. If this works, then I will order another one. We have 2 dogs and 3 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Best pet food container available!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love it!!! I wish they had a smaller size. I have four Chi’s and I purchase 3-4 different flavors of kibble and mix them. So we are not dealing in quantity lol! It is so nice looking it sits in my family room by the puppies bowls and it looks great. Streamlined my whole process and the food is fresh. Simpleton is the best by far!
customer_reviews.author: LSW

customer_reviews.title: Capacity is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the xl pet food which said it would hold 40 lbs 0f dogfood. My Purino Pro bag of 34 lbs does not fit. Still need a place for about 5 lbs. I have a smaller one, large, that holds a 34 lb bag of same food, so I don’t get it! Very frustrating. I have two dogs who each need a different kind of Purina food, so I thought this would be perfect. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The pet food container is pricey for sure but it is very good at keeping our dogs food fresh and it looks quite modern too! I love the fact that the scoop sits in the lid and that there is wheels in the back of you need to move it while full. The lock is great because it keeps curious always hungry noses out :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made, holds a large bag of food
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dog food storage bin. The first one we had for about 3 years before getting a new puppy who needed his own dog food bin. This product is fantastic. We have magnet labels which stick onto it to keep track of any feed changes and we couldn't be happier. We buy the 32 pound bags of food and they fit in the container perfectly. If we get more dogs, we will definitely get more of these bins!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Sci-Fi Pet Feeding
customer_reviews.text: A truly space age vessel for your cat (or dog, or pet dinosaur) dry food, this thing is fantastic. The sealing clasp feels decidedly Star Trek engineering bay-esque, and the design is unobtrusive and modern. Works fantastic -- comes with a clever scoop that attaches magnetically to the inside of the lid. You'll never go back to living without your 25th century pet food storage system again.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastiaan

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but not friendly to open and close
customer_reviews.text: This item is a little pricy, but the food has kept. I lien that it came with a measuring tool that attacked to the inside lid. It’s a nice looking unit and fit perfectly in my pantry. My only complaint is the locking mechanism. It’s not really user friendly. The children have learned to open and close the lock, but it took an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Witt III

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it’s a large container.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but I completely misjudged the size. It’s for medium to large size dogs rather than a cat. It’s was almost as large as my kitchen trash can. Great looking and functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: katecane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Good looking
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for storing our new Black Lab Puppy's food. Nice study metal, finger print proof and locking lid. There is a scoop that clicks inside the lid. I'll use that later when she gets bigger to dish out her food. Slim profile. Great looking too as it sits out where people can see it. Would thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R Bentlage

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with raccoons getting into our plastic dog food containers. I was hesitant to spend the money on this, but needed a good solution. This is exactly that. The raccoons haven't figured out how to unlatch the lid and I'm happy to report the dog food is fresh and secure!
customer_reviews.author: Michele K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly likely to arrive dented.
customer_reviews.text: It came dented. I spent over $100, and it came dented. I hammered it out, but it's still not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage Option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to store dog food. The scoop integrated to the lid makes it very convenient. The lock function keeps it very well sealed. You can't tell it is full of dog food until you open it. A bit pricey, but it looks really good sitting out in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman Stainless steel pet food can.
customer_reviews.text: This the best dog food container. It holds a 40 pound bag of food. It’s air tight, love how the food scooper has a tight magnetic hold. It fits the stainless steel design of my kitchen. Had knee replacement, I no longer have to go to basement to get dog food for my girls. This was well worth the money. Also comes with a 10 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: leta Washington

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived dented.  Packaging was fine.
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful...The packaging was perfect. Inside and outside. But the product inside Was damaged and dented. That being said, I considered returning and reordering until I got a perfect one. Instead I found a location that pretty much hides the damage and reported it to Amazon. Besides the damage, I really like it. Without arriving dented I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marotta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just received this to use with16# dry kitten One food. It is better than I expected. Looks nice, so it can be used close by and not an eye sore. I hesitated on ordering because of the $ but am glad I got it. I think it will hold 27# easily and then some. This is well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Love this, but...
customer_reviews.text: FYI- it claims to hold 40lbs of dog food. I use Purina Pro shredded blend food, my 35lb bag did not even come close to fitting in this; maybe holds 30lbs. With that being said this is a wonderful product! Not only does it look great, but it's very functional, I love that the liner comes out for easy cleaning. I will be buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm counting on it being dog proof.
customer_reviews.text: Finally - I think I have found a dog food container that my ravenous and relentless yellow lab can't defeat. I call him my little overachiever. I had to take him to the emergency vet because he swallowed a tennis ball - they found two. Nothing is safe from him but I think this container has finally foiled him. It's crazy expensive but beautiful and money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food container, works efficiently and seems to seal well ... except for the very unpleasant strong smell early on or it would get 5 stars. Had to wash several times and air out for a few days. I was concerned if was safe. Smell got better, but the first 2 dog bags of food, our pup was not as enthusiastic to eat. I recommend keeping the dog food in the bag inside the container for the first month, so the smell doesn’t absorb into the food. Love the magnetic scooper and wheels are handy! After 2 months, only a very slight odor and dog eats food fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: By incredible I mean smart, determined
customer_reviews.text: I may be a simple human but I have an incredible dog! By incredible I mean smart, determined, and extremely food driven. Seriously folks we reviewed our home security cam footage and found the dog had flipped around our heavy duty stainless steel foot peddle garbage can and proceeded to jam the peddle with his back paws in order to open the can enough to get his greedy head inside. I find it adorable that some people can keep their pet food in plastic containers...we simply can't. This pet food canister is sturdy, attractive, and as long as your pup lacks opposable thumbs the lock/handle makes it impossible for them to open it. . . Two thumbs up. (Pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sperring

customer_reviews.title: Great container for Pet Food!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Simplehuman pet food containers! They are sleek stainless steel. The seal works great to keep the food fresh. I bought the extra-large size through Costco and liked it so much I wanted the smaller size for my small pups food. The small one on Amazon is the same price as the extra-large at Costco, but I didn't need another one that size. It was worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Using this product for dry dog food. I love it. Keeps the food fresh. The scoop has a very strong magnet to keep it in place (now I never lose the scoop and don't have to half bury it in the food in the storage container. It's a clean look. The only issue is that everyone who see's it thinks it's a trash can. Really glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Love this!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I am so glad I bought it the only downfall that I can find is the scoop I like the scoop but it is hard for me to pull it out of the little holding spot in the lid which is nothing major but I did want to mention it
customer_reviews.author: Atkinskid

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and it is exactly what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and it is exactly what I was looking for in a stylish dog food container. I would rate it as 5 stars were it not for 2 things; one being the price. I mean c'mon I've seen their standard SS trash can's on sale for a quarter of the amount that I paid for this thing (and really what's the difference between the two?) and the 2nd being that the hinges on the lid are not "auto-close" or "soft-close" and this thing has a pretty substantial lid which results in a lot of banging. In that regard I guess it's a good thing it has a 10 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Daric

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold 30 pounds of kibble!
customer_reviews.text: This container does not hold even close to 30 pounds of kibble. I spent a lot of money thinking I would not have to store a thirty-pound bag in two containers. What a huge disappointment to spend so much and not achieve your goal. High quality but erroneous description. Maddening at best.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly

customer_reviews.title: tight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The clip lock keeps the kibble fresh and dry. Even keeps out the humidity. The wheels make it easy to move around to fill or clean behind. Wish I had purchased this years ago, would have saved throwing quite a bit a bleh dog food.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the dog yet.
customer_reviews.text: The container is awesome! Mine arrived perfect, no dents or scratches or anything crazy like that. It exactly holds a 30 lb bag of food, which lasts me months. The food stays fresh that whole time. The scoop magnetic works great, the latch and seal work great. I don't really have a problem with my dog trying to open the container, he's a three legged corgi, he couldn't get to the latch even if he wanted to. But it does lock down really secure. The whole container looks really nice in the kitchen. It also contains the smell of the dog food, which I LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Great but, a bit pricy but I think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t brought my dog home yet but I just got this to prepare for my puppy to return home. This material is great, fingerprint proof, smooth surface, and the lock is good. It might not be as air tight as I imagine but I think it has got a good deal once you lock it and your pet will definitely not be able to “open” it. It comes with a scoop which has measurement of 1/2 cup-1cup which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: J Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet food storage
customer_reviews.text: This pet food storage bin has worked out well for us. The plastic on the front of the bin is still chewable as we (and one of our dogs) found out! Also, the scoop is hard to read but it is still a great design.
customer_reviews.author: A. Listener

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food fresh but dented
customer_reviews.text: As expensive as this is, I really like it. But I had to order 3 times to get a good one and even this most recent one has a dent. I might try exchanging it one more time because it really does keep food fresh. But it’s a pain to get a decent one.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: function & style
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I wished for and more. Capacity fits a large size dog food bag, keeps it uncommonly fresh and it looks great. Going to invest in another one as I have two large dogs with two different diets.
customer_reviews.author: Odvaha

customer_reviews.title: Classy Dog Food Storage
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something large, stainless like the trash and appliances, and easy to access for daily use. This is working out great and seems to seal tight to keep the food fresh and the rodents and ants out.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Diego Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I wish I could give it 5 stars but mine came dented and scratched but since still usable instead of going through the hassle of returning I kept it. definitely an airtight seal and the magnetic scoop feature is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ShiningStarFAE

customer_reviews.title: Another Quality simplehuman Product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this can to hold a 35 pound bag of Costco dog food, specifically, and it does that perfectly well. The entire bag of food fits in this size can, and the lid seals nicely. The removable plastic container inside the container makes cleaning easy. I was worried about it arriving dinged up, but the packing job was great and it was in tip-top shape. It's expensive for what it is, but simplehuman products will serve you well for years, and their customer service is exceptional. This is one the cases where you do, indeed, get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to avoid spoiled food or "fly eggs & flies"
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, it works perfect. Worth the price. Arrived non damaged.
customer_reviews.author: N9SSU

customer_reviews.title: It does look clean and nice though.
customer_reviews.text: It's very sleek. My first choice would have been something more decorative but we have two large dogs which require purchasing 44 lb bags of food. When you purchase that much food you need a large container and they don't make "cute" containers for 44 lbs of food. It does look clean and nice though.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out dogs AND toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This dog food container was extremely expensive, but after replacing at least three others my dogs managed to chew through, I knew it was time for drastic measures. We have had this storage container for at least three months now and it has successfully averted all attempts. It is easy to use and I love the built-in magnetic scoop. It looks great and having a narrow profile doesn't seem too out of place against the wall where we currently keep it stored. As an added bonus, our toddler has also not learned how to open the top keeping the dog food just for the dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large bags of dog food
customer_reviews.text: VERY large which is good for those of us buying large bags of dog food. Air tight. Easy grip latch with magnet on interior scoop to keep it on ready for daily use. No longer digging around for scoop. All in all I’d say this is a very good, well made product. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Attractive container that doesn't meet price point quality expectations
customer_reviews.text: The simple human pet food storage can does keep our kibble nice and fresh while looking nice. However, as others have noted, the wheels don't work on hard surfaces, so you are really just dragging it across your hardwood which defeats the purpose. Also, as noted in other reviews, our unit arrived dented. I was able to push the dent out from the inside enough that I didn't think returning was worth the hastle. However, for a $100 pet food container, I definitely expected more.
customer_reviews.author: James Camara

customer_reviews.title: best part is the magnetic scoop
customer_reviews.text: works great! I put my dog food bag in the bucket instead of pouring the dog food in the bucket -makes for easier cleanup. the best part is the magnetic scoop in the lid. the tight seal closure is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great storage container
customer_reviews.text: This is a great storage container. Yes, it's expensive, but you get what you pay for. That having been said, it arrived with several dents, but I'm keeping it anyway. It's solid, and my dog will never get into it. It has ample storage for my normal 40 pound bag of food.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Hold As Much Kibble As Stated
customer_reviews.text: Lost one star because it does not hold much more than 21 pounds of our dog’s kibble, Don’t know whether the kibble is bulkier than other brands, but there was no way the container would hold the full 28-pound bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bart S.

customer_reviews.title: Expect big dents when you receive this.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice pet food holder, but like multiple other reviews said, mine came damaged. Has a big dent on the side. Wouldn't mind it so much if it weren't for the fact that this costs $100. Should arrive in PERFECT condition for that kind of money. Returning it and requested a replacement. We'll see how many deliveries it takes to get one right.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase. We need to keep an extra bag of food in hand and this container is the absolute best. It keeps the food fresh, and the Hounds can’t get into it. The scoop is convenient the magnetic holder is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Yehudit bat Keren

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Like most, I was hesitant about spending so much for my puppy’s food storage. But I really wanted something that was stylish and airtight to not only keep the food fresh but also to prevent my kitchen from smelling like kibble. This container met all of my needs. The size was perfect for the space. The 18lb bag of dog food fit perfectly. And it matches the rest of my kitchen appliances and trash can. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We have a simple human garbage can and this looks great next to it. Our dog knows her food is in here, but can not access it, which is a huge bonus. It rolls really easily to move out of the way if you need to move it. Holds enough food for a month for our dog right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K Barron

customer_reviews.title: nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this looks, i like the magnetic placement of the scoop in the lid, very convenient! This container is small enough to fit under a cabinet (slide out drawer) and in a small closet. Comfortably holds a whole 25lb bag of food!
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small breed (13lb bag of food)
customer_reviews.text: This container is PERFECT! As you can see from the photos, a 13lb bag of puppy food fits like a glove. Yes, it's definitely more expensive that other similar products but the quality and build is top notch. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: 808Globetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Great storage option
customer_reviews.text: I really like the unit, and in fact I bought a second one, to store additional food. It comes with a scoop, which magnetically attaches to the lid, and is very useful. I would highly recommend this unit, it’s worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and highly functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and a good size for 20 lbs bag of dog food. We just put bag and all in the container. It would hold much more if you emptied the bag into the container. We had no problems with plastic order, as we have had with other containers. We moved it into the kitchen area because it was nice looking and a slim size. The lock feature on the lid is good for keeping craw lies out and dog food orders in. Rey pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain14er

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with bugs in my dog’s food container, I realized I needed a better solution. It seals the food well AND it also looks pretty. Pricey but worth it for the quality. Love that it has a scoop conveniently stored inside the lid!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: i found this item by accident. I got email from pet supplier advertising this iteam - it was more discounted at amazon so I bought it from amazon. I have two dogs and I usually order large size dry dog food. I have an option of rolling the can to the dog bowls or I can take a bowl and carry it to the can. It's stylish, compact size, has a wonderful scooper that is on magent, wheels, made with high quality and easy to open/close. And my entire huge bag of dog food fits in it - how convinient. Wish I found this item sooner, worth the investment :)
customer_reviews.author: Uhshbsbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful container and works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks sleek. Came with no dents and works really well for dog food. Now we are thinking of buying another one for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Alegna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size - love the wheels!
customer_reviews.text: We recently downsized & had to rethink how we store our pups kibble. This unit is perfectly sized & comfortably fits under my desk. I pull it out 2x daily & wheels function well on hard wood floors. I absolutely love the interior/magnetic scoop too - my only wish is that it was a little smaller because I'm a sucker & have been feeding my pups too much ;-)
customer_reviews.author: SKR

customer_reviews.title: Sealed and Secured
customer_reviews.text: I keep the dog food in my closet in the upstairs bedroom because this is where the dogs are fed. I did not want a big bag of food sitting on the closet floor smelling up my clothes and tempting the dogs. Plastic containers either were not lasting (cracking) or did not seal 100% keeping the food fresh. This product does!!!!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: susiy richmond

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's expensive however it does hold 40 lb bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's expensive however it does hold 40 lb bag of Kirkland Dog food so it gets the job done. It was delivered with a dent on the side and no I haven't contacted the seller. I would have gave it 5 starts but 1 star deduction for the dent
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a Simple Human kitchen trash can and love it, so I thought this would be great for my boys' food. So far so good. Arrived in perfect condition. Held the amount of food I needed it to. Haven't had it long enough to see how fresh the food stays but I'm optimistic. Oh and I love that the scoop is in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Classy.... maybe too much money though.
customer_reviews.text: First this is a very classy looking dog food container. Second the lid is not a quick close and lock in a hurry thing. All in all ai do not do many reviews but a lower price point may have gotten me to try this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The product is awesome! Just what I needed for my dog food ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome! Just what I needed for my dog food storage issue. It is too bad the storage can arrived with dents on both sides at the bottom. I needed a storage container right away so I had to take a hammer and some plastic conduit to pound out the dents; something you would do if you bought it at a discount store.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The unit is portable although I have it in a fixed location. It is sleek looking, easy to lock so the kibble continues being fresh. I am extremely pleased with this product because it is well made and will last a long time. Accolades to the manufacturers and designers.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dry dog food and it works perfecly....I get a 24 pound bag of dog food, and it’s just right.....rm
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Love Simple Human
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Simple Human air tight on wheels for easy movement, keeps food fresh! Now I own two Simple Human one bigger, one a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: shiloh

customer_reviews.title: works well for dog food
customer_reviews.text: I can buy larger bags of food for my medium sized dog and not worry about it going stale. It holds a 30 lb bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: RR3

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny - Superb Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are superb quality. I use it to store my bird feed - a 40-pound bag fits in it perfectly. They are attractive as well - you can keep it in the house instead of the garage! The wheels make it easy to move and the top seals tightly, keeping everything "just bought" fresh. It's great for storing pet food. I purchased a second one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Babzter

customer_reviews.title: Form and function
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dog food can. I buy dog food in a 16.5 pound bag, which fits nicely in the XL can without having to dump the food out of the bag. The scoop stored in the lid is convenient. I stick my dog's feeding schedule/amounts on to the can with a magnet. I don't have a lot of space and so I wanted something that could be out in the open and not look bad, and this can fits the bill. Very minor con is that guests frequently mistake it for a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Pressprich

product_meta.title: simplehuman 25 Liter, 27lb / 12.2 kg Medium Pet Food Storage Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style Name:25 Liter (Medium)

Store your dog or cat food elegantly and safe from prying pets with this 25-liter pet food storage can, which is made of durable, fingerprint-proof stainless steel. The large, ergonomic handle locks the lid shut to help prevent pets from opening the lid and forms an airtight seal to keep food fresh. And the pet food can's slim, space-saving shape and built-in wheels make it an ideal replacement for large, heavy and unwieldy bags of pet food. This 25-liter can fit approximately 27 pounds of dog food. The food-safe (BPA-free) plastic inner bucket is removable and easy to clean. Other highlights include a lid-mounted scoop that attaches neatly under the lid for easy access and a 10-year warranty. It measures 18-1/8 by 10-3/8 by 19-3/8 inches.

KEEP FOOD IN AND PETS OUT
Our pet food can has a lock-tight handle that forms an airtight seal to keep food fresh.





LID-MOUNTED SCOOP
Convenient scoop attaches neatly under the lid for easy access.







FOOD-SAFE INNER BUCKET
Inner bucket is BPA-free and safe for food, and lifts out of the can for easy cleaning. 



BUILT-IN WHEELS
Built-in wheels make the can easy to roll out at meal time. 



AVAILABLE MODELS
 * Medium fits approximately 27 pounds of pet food 
 * Large fits approximately 32 pounds of pet food 
 * Extra-Large fits approximately 40 pounds of pet food 



BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: Silicone gasket forms an airtight seal keeps food fresh
